00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00034 #include "IdealShapeTarget.hpp"
00035 #include "MsqError.hpp"
00036 #include "PatchData.hpp"
00037 
00038 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00039 
00040 IdealShapeTarget::~IdealShapeTarget() {}
00041 
00042 bool IdealShapeTarget::get_3D_target( PatchData& pd, 
00043                                       size_t element,
00044                                       Sample sample,
00045                                       MsqMatrix<3,3>& W_out,
00046                                       MsqError& err )
00047 {
00048   MsqMeshEntity& elem = pd.element_by_index(element);
00049   ideal_shape_3D( elem.get_element_type(),
00050                   sample, pd, W_out, err );
00051   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00052 }
00053 
00054 bool IdealShapeTarget::get_surface_target( PatchData& pd, 
00055                                            size_t element,
00056                                            Sample sample,
00057                                            MsqMatrix<3,2>& W_out,
00058                                            MsqError& err )
00059 {
00060   MsqMatrix<2,2> W_2d;
00061   bool rval = get_2D_target(pd, element, sample, W_2d, err );
00062   if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !rval)
00063     return false;
00064   
00065   W_out(0,0) = W_2d(0,0); W_out(0,1) = W_2d(0,1);
00066   W_out(1,0) = W_2d(1,0); W_out(1,1) = W_2d(1,1);
00067   W_out(2,0) = 0.0;       W_out(2,1) = 0.0;
00068   return true;
00069 }
00070 
00071 bool IdealShapeTarget::get_2D_target( PatchData& pd, 
00072                                       size_t element,
00073                                       Sample sample,
00074                                       MsqMatrix<2,2>& W_out,
00075                                       MsqError& err )
00076 {
00077   MsqMeshEntity& elem = pd.element_by_index(element);
00078   ideal_shape_2D( elem.get_element_type(),
00079                   sample, pd, W_out, err );
00080   return !MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00081 }
00082 
00083 bool IdealShapeTarget::have_surface_orient() const
00084   { return false; }
